column1: Little Goat Diner////We had their Macho Nachos and even with splitting the meal
column2: we couldn't finish it.  It was darned good
column3: their pulled pork is wonderful and the homemade chips are superb.  We both thought they could use a little heat in their mystery white sauce.  There were a few pickled jalapeños scattered about
column4: but not enough for my liking.   All in all
column7: wonderful coffee.  The wait was certainly acceptable for a top notch food place on a Saturday.   I love the interior of the building
column8: too.  I'm not sure it's deco but it is certainly retro.  Great lines!
